content: Multi-sport event in Singapore The **Singapore Biennial Games** were first introduced on 15 September 2010 by [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)'s Senior Parliamentary Secretary for Community Development, Youth and Sports, [Teo Ser Luck](/wiki/Teo_Ser_Luck). Organized by the [Singapore Sports Council](/wiki/Singapore_Sports_Council) and co-organized by the People's Association of Singapore, the games will take place once every two years, with the first edition of the games in 2012, in an effort to keep up the [2010 Summer Youth Olympics](/wiki/2010_Summer_Youth_Olympics) legacy. This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore Biennial Games
